title: Minnale Nee Vanthathenadi Lyrics May Madham
stanzas:
[Minnale nee
vanthathenadi.
en kannile oru
kaayam ennadi.
en vaanile nee maraindhu
pona maayam ennadi

sila naaligai
nee vandhu ponadhu
en maaligai adhu
vendhu ponadhu
minnale en vaanam
unnai thaeduthe.] (2)

Kanvizhithu paartha podhu
kalaindha vannamae.
un kairegai indru mattum
ninaivu chinname.

kathari kathari enadhu
ullam udainthu ponathe.
indru sidhari pona
sillil ellaam unadhu bimbame

kanneeril thee valarthu
kaathirukkiren
un kaaladi thalathil
naan pooththirukkiren

Minnale nee
vanthathenadi.
en kannile oru
kaayam ennadi.
en vaanile nee maraindhu
pona maayam ennadi

sila naaligai
nee vandhu ponadhu
en maaligai adhu
vendhu ponadhu
minnale en vaanam
unnai thaeduthe.

paal mazhaikku kaathirukkum
boomi illaiyaa
oru pandigaikku kaathirukkum
saami illaiyaa (2)

vaaarthai vara kaathirukkum
kavigyan illaiyaa
naan kaathirunthaal
kadhal innum
neelum illaiyaa!!

kanneeril thee valarthu
kaathirukkiren
un kaaladi thalathil
naan pooththirukkiren

Minnale nee
vanthathenadi.
en kannile oru
kaayam ennadi.
en vaanile nee maraindhu
pona maayam ennadi

sila naaligai
nee vandhu ponadhu
en maaligai adhu
vendhu ponadhu
minnale en vaanam
unnai thaeduthe.
